notes.note:
Disabled support for the [CookieStore API][1] due to compatibility concerns. The API will be enabled later once the compatibility issues have been addressed.


  [1]: https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/CookieStore

Fixed a bug where "Cookies and site data" and "Temporary cached files and pages" were enabled after updating to Fx136 for users with "History" and/or "Site settings" on shutdown enabled on previous versions. ([Bug 1952564][1])

Affected users can go to "Privacy & Security" settings directly after the upgrade and uncheck both boxes to avoid getting logged out. 


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1952564

Fixed the Primary Password prompt displaying in unexpected circumstances. ([Bug 1946121][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1946121

Fixed visibility issues with radio buttons on dark backgrounds. ([Bug 1951930][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1951930

Fixed high CPU usage on Windows specifically when the screen is locked or the laptop lid is closed. ([Bug 1924932][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1924932

system_requirements:
## Windows

### Operating Systems (32-bit and 64-bit)
 - Windows 10 or later

### Recommended Hardware
-  1 gigahertz (GHz) or faster compatible processor or System on a Chip (SoC)
-  1GB of RAM / 2GB of RAM for the 64-bit version
-  500MB of hard drive space

---

## Mac

### Operating Systems
- macOS 10.15 or later

### Recommended Hardware
- Macintosh computer with an Intel x86 or Apple silicon processor
- 512 MB of RAM
- 200 MB hard drive space

---

## GNU/Linux

### Software Requirements

*Please note that GNU/Linux distributors may provide packages for your distribution which have different requirements.*

- Firefox will not run at all without the following libraries or packages:
    - glibc 2.17 or higher
    - GTK+ 3.14 or higher
    - libglib 2.42 or higher
    - libstdc++ 4.8.1 or higher
    - X.Org 1.0 or higher (1.7 or higher is recommended)
- For optimal functionality, we recommend the following libraries or packages:
    - DBus 1.0 or higher
    - NetworkManager 0.7 or higher
    - PulseAudio
title: Firefox 136.0.2 Release
